name: Go Systems Full Game Demo Package
name_original: Go Systems Full Game Demo Package
description:
✨ GO SYSTEM Engine is the most complete top-down solution It is the best framework whether you are new to Unity, or an experienced developer. Clean code, good practices, optimizations, and a solid foundation allow creating 2D games. It's very fast, and it works on desktop, mobile, and anywhere you want. It's packed with features, built on player feedback and a great feel to the game at its core, and constantly updated, it's the best tool for creating a 2D game that you'll really be satisfied with.

A professional systems for youe 2d gams on unity engine in this package:

🔴swing rope system

🔴 climb system

🔴swimming system

🔴diving system

🔴zipline system

🔴 climbline system

🔴carry items system

🔴basic move system

🔴 score system

🔴 die and win

🔴event system on all action

🔴you can add sounds

🔴you can add effects

and more in this package

note: you should import "2D animation" package from unity packages

you can get it from this link click here
